Putting It Together

Saltwater and freshwater

Total Water on Earth

  • 97% Saline water (oceans)
  • 3% Fresh water
  • Icecaps and Glaciers: 68.7%
  • Ground Water: 30.1%
  • Other: 0.9%
  • Surface Water: 0.3%
    • 87% Lakes
    • 11% Swamps
    • 2% Rivers

Most of the water on Earth is saltwater (97%), and only a little is freshwater (3%).
